Download

Get pgelephant and start building high-availability PostgreSQL clusters.

Repository Setup

Add the official pgelephant repository for easy package management and updates.

Debian/Ubuntu Repository

Add GPG Key
curl -fsSL https://packages.pgelephant.com/gpg.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/pgelephant-archive-keyring.gpg
Add Repository
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/pgelephant-archive-keyring.gpg] https://packages.pgelephant.com/debian stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgelephant.list
Update & Install
sudo apt update
sudo apt install pgelephant-rale pgelephant-ram pgelephant-postgresql pgelephant-postgresql-custom

RHEL/CentOS Repository

Add Repository
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://packages.pgelephant.com/rpm/pgelephant.repo
Update & Install
sudo yum update
sudo yum install pgelephant-rale pgelephant-ram pgelephant-postgresql pgelephant-postgresql-custom

RALE Consensus

Distributed store for leader election and cluster coordination

Debian Package
apt install pgelephant-rale
RPM Package
yum install pgelephant-rale

RAM Resilient Adaptive Manager

Intelligent cluster management with automatic failover

Debian Package
apt install pgelephant-ram
RPM Package
yum install pgelephant-ram

FauxDB

MongoDB-compatible document database for PostgreSQL.

Debian Package
apt install pgelephant-fauxdb
RPM Package
yum install pgelephant-fauxdb

Secure PostgreSQL

Hardened PostgreSQL with enhanced security features

Debian Package
apt install pgelephant-postgresql
RPM Package
yum install pgelephant-postgresql

Package Distribution

All pgelephant components are available as Debian (.deb) and RPM (.rpm) packages for easy deployment.

Debian/Ubuntu Packages

  • • pgelephant-rale - RALE consensus distributed store
  • • pgelephant-ram - RAM resilient adaptive manager
  • • pgelephant-postgresql - Secure PostgreSQL
  • • pgelephant-postgresql-custom - Custom patched PostgreSQL

RHEL/CentOS Packages

  • • pgelephant-rale - RALE consensus distributed store
  • • pgelephant-ram - RAM resilient adaptive manager
  • • pgelephant-postgresql - Secure PostgreSQL
  • • pgelephant-postgresql-custom - Custom patched PostgreSQL

CLI Installation

Install via CLI tool

Command
curl -fsSL https://get.pgelephant.com | sh

Docker

Run with Docker container

Command
docker run -d pgelephant/pgelephant:latest

GitHub Release

Download from GitHub

Command
wget https://github.com/pgElephant/rale/releases/latest/download/pgelephant-linux-amd64

Quick Start Guide

Get your first PostgreSQL cluster running in under 5 minutes.

1

Initialize Cluster

Create a new 3-node cluster

Terminal
pgelephant cluster init --nodes 3
2

Start Cluster

Start all nodes in the cluster

Terminal
pgelephant cluster start
3

Check Status

View cluster health and status

Terminal
pgelephant cluster status
